features: SPF lotion with Glycolic Acid: this anti-aging face cream contains SPF 30, plus a multitasking combo of Glycolic Acid (AHA), Vitamin C and Pro-Retinol to reveal brighter skin, help correct uneven skin tone and reduce the appearance of wrinkles in 1 week
Moisturizer with SPF: this hydrating face moisturizer with Broad Spectrum SPF 30 sunscreen helps protect against the sun’s aging UVA/UVB rays
Replenish skin with facial moisturizer: gift your skin a daily dose of hydration from Revitalift anti-aging skin care to provide your skin essential moisture to keep skin healthy
For daily use: smooth this intensive day cream over the face and neck until thoroughly absorbed; Use in the AM alone as part of your daily skin care routine or layer as needed to brighten skin

With Revitalift skincare you can add an anti-aging benefit to any step of your skin care; gently exfoliate with Revitalift daily facial cleanser, treat with Revitalift Derm Intensives Hyaluronic Acid Face Serum and moisturize with Triple Power Day Cream
body.description: L'Oreal Paris Revitalift Bright Reveal skincare line, powered with Glycolic Acid and Vitamin C, delivers brightening plus anti-wrinkle skincare benefits to reveal more radiant, younger looking skin.Beyond wrinkles, dull, uneven t1 can make skin look older. Daily UV exposure, aging and past acne marks can cause skin to overproduce skin darkening pigment below the surface. As skin’s natural ability to shed surface dead skin cells declines with age, dark spots and uneven t1 become increasingly more visible, leaving skin looking older and more dull.Revitalift Bright Reveal consists of 4 unique products to complete your daily routine: Brightening Daily Facial Cleanser, Brightening Exfoliating Peel Pads, Brightening Dual Overnight Moisturizer, and Brightening Day Moisturizer with SPF 30. The products can be used al1, as an entire routine or implemented into your own skincare routine. However, newly revealed skin may be sensitive to sunlight. Be sure to use Broad Spectrum protection.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: L’Oréal Paris Revitalift Bright Reveal Skincare L’Oréal Paris Revitalift Bright Reveal skincare line, powered with Glycolic Acid and Vitamin C, delivers brightening + anti-wrinkle skincare benefits to reveal more radiant, younger looking skin. Beyond wrinkles, dull, uneven tone can make skin look older. Daily UV exposure, aging and past acne marks can cause skin to overproduce skin darkening pigment below the surface. As skin’s natural ability to shed surface dead skin cells declines with age, dark spots and uneven tone become increasingly more visible, leaving skin looking older and more dull. Revitalift Bright Reveal consists of four unique products to complete your daily routine: Brightening Daily Facial Cleanser, Brightening Peel Pads, Brightening Dual Overnight Moisturizer, and Brightening Day Moisturizer with SPF 30. The products can be used alone, as an entire routine or implemented into your own skincare routine. However, newly revealed skin may be sensitive to sunlight. Be sure to use Broad Spectrum protection.

Daily Brightening Scrub Cleanser Gentle Daily Exfoliating Peel Pads Brightening SPF30 Moisturizer Brightening Dual Overnight Moisturizer Skin Concern Gently Exfoliates Dullness Visibly Reveals Radiance Peels Away Dull, Uneven Tone, Reveals Brighter Skin and Reduces Wrinkles Visibly Brightens Skin, Evens Skin Tone, Reduces Wrinkles. Visibly Refines Skin Clarity & Tone. Reduces Wrinkles. Key Ingredients Natural Volcanic particles, Glycolic Acid, Vit C and Glycerin 10% Glycolic Complex: Glycolic Acid, Vit C, Citric Acid, HEPES Glycolic Acid, Vit C, Pro-Retinol, Broad Spectrum SPF30 Glycolic Acid, Vit C, Pro-Retinol How it works This daily facial cleanser gently exfoliates dullness to visibly reveal radiant skin. The formula helps to purify skin by immediately dissolving impurities. Anti-wrinkle + brightening treatment. 30 Multi-Ply Daily Textured Pads physically resurface dead skin cells to reveal underlying, youthful looking skin. Face moisturizer with SPF 30 to visibly brighten, hydrate and rejuvenate dull, lackluster skin to reveal brighter, younger looking skin. Broad Spectrum SPF 30 sunscreen helps protect against the sun’s aging UVA/UVB rays. Overnight moisturizer treatment combines two effective treatments in one pump. Red Chamber with glycolic acid removes dead skin cells to help absorption. White Chamber with Vitamin C + Pro-Retinol reduces visibility of uneven tone and wrinkles. Directions for Usage Every morning and evening Use daily (preferably at night) on clean skin. Gently apply in a circular motion to face, avoiding the eyes. Do not rinse. Use every morning after cleansing. Every night, smooth gently over cleansed skin.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 11, 2024
reviews.reviewText: So happy I purchased this. Put it on auto order. I plan to continue using.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 15, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Finally found the right spf moisturizer that doesn't make my face shiny
reviews.reviewText: I've tried a gazillion moisturizers wth spf, and they either feel too thin to do any good or they make my face super shiny. I had skin cancer in my 30s and I've been super careful with sun exposure since then. This feels excellent and I trust L'Oreal as far as the spf even though I never push my luck by staying out long with the sun on my face. The most pleasant thing is that my face is not shiny. All the other brands have forced me to put on loose face powder after I put on moisturizer to hide the shine. After this, I put a tiny bit of powder on my nose, but I could get away with not doing that. Super pleased with this. No other product did this. Thanks L'Oreal!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 22, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This really brightens my skin. It has a nice scent and very moisturizing.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 13, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great item, works flawlessly!
reviews.reviewText: Works very well and has great moisturizing features.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 15, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars New favorite serum
reviews.reviewText: I love that is has glycolic acid & SPF and it doesn't feel like sunscreen. I was using Pacifica glow baby since it has glycolic acid, but it doesn't include SPF. I was also using Olay night cream but it doesn't have glycolic acid and if I used my other serum in the morning after olay, my face would be a little red from irritation. But THIS stuff..... This stuff has everything that I'm looking for in a serum and I love the way it feels and looks on my skin. it is also the most affordable product that I have seen that includes the ingredients that I look for. So glad I found this! I know everyone has different skin types, and some are more sensitive than others, but this seems to be working for me. If you are trying different products it wouldn't hurt to try this.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 17, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars It Cakes or Peels up in globs
reviews.reviewText: I put on a thin layer. After a few minutes, I got ready to put on my primer. I rubbed across my face and it started to peel up in little wads on my face. Had to wash my face. Too cakey. And, I'm telling you--I cleansed first, put on my serum, and then applied a thin layer. I was not gobbing it on. The texture is off.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars my face cream for over 30 years!
reviews.reviewText: I have used this facial cream for over 30 years and it has made my skin look so young!!!!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 13, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great at fading my facial dark sunspots!
reviews.reviewText: I had some darker patches of skin on my face from sun damage. This is the only product ( and I have tried several) that faded them into nonexistence. Great product!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on June 22, 2023

reviews.reviewText: I love this product. This is my second buy. I also use Rivalift dual moisturiser at night

reviews.reviewText: Really lovely moisturiser and great seller!
